question: Which of the following represents Latency?
option1: propagation time +transmission time +queuing time + processing delay
option2: propagation time - transmission time +queuing time + processing delay
option3: propagation time +transmission time +queuing time - processing delay
answer: propagation time +transmission time +queuing time + processing delay
explanation: It can be said that the Latency is made of four components: propagation time, transmission time, queuing time and processing delay. Latency =propagation time +transmission time +queuing time + processing delay
